p:
where
C p
and
C f
are the concentrations (mg/ml) of solutes (protein, sucrose, or stachyose) in the permeate and feed solution, respectively. The retentate was lyophilized and referred to as RSP P7, RSP A, RSP F, and RSP P6 for SP P7, SP A, SP F, and SP P6, respectively. A new PES membrane was used for each UF experiment to avoid a loss of permeability due to membrane fouling.
